text: 50 years people keep asking you've been
looking for 50 years you haven't found
anything right if we've found something
you don't know about you need to think
about that here's the analogy we've been
using other people's telescopes so we
haven't been looking very much about 50
years and all of the searching we've
done today is like taking a single glass
of water eight ounces out of the Earth's
oceans and looking in that glass and
saying hmm are there any fish there are
there any fish in the ocean well they're
no fish in my glass so probably there
are any fish in the ocean that's the
kind of level of silliness
when you say that 50 years of searching
has any significance so what we're doing
is we're building a brand-new telescope
right and I think we've got a video of
that so we spent three years doing the
R&D to figure out how to do it we spent
two years actually building this in
Northern California today we have 42 of
these antennas working as a telescope
doing radio astronomy and SETI
simultaneously 24/7 and this is the
future that we see for the Hat Creek
Valley in Northern California where this
array will grow from 42 to 350 now to
make that happen
you just have to add money right we're
ready so anybody who brought their
checkbook tonight I'd be willing to to
entertain that
